Name: ISO/IEC 27001 Information Security Management Standard 2022
Description: ISO (the International Organization for Standardization) and IEC (the International Electrotechnical Commission) form the specialized system for worldwide standardization. This framework maps AWS security controls to ISO 27001:2022 requirements.

Requirements.Description: Information security policy and topic-specific policies should be defined, approved by management, published, communicated to and acknowledged by relevant personnel and relevant interested parties, and reviewed at planned intervals and if significant changes occur.
Requirements.Name: Policies for information security

Attributes.Check_Summary: Verify that information security policies are defined and implemented through security monitoring services.

Requirements.Description: Information security roles and responsibilities should be defined and allocated according to the organisation needs.
Requirements.Name: Roles and Responsibilities

Attributes.Check_Summary: Verify that IAM roles and responsibilities are properly defined.

Requirements.Description: Conflicting duties and conflicting areas of responsibility should be segregated.
Requirements.Name: Segregation of Duties

Attributes.Check_Summary: Verify that duties are segregated through separate IAM roles.

Requirements.Description: User end point devices should be protected.
Requirements.Name: User End Point Devices

Attributes.Check_Summary: Verify that endpoint protection and monitoring are enabled.

Requirements.Description: Rules for the effective use of cryptography, including cryptographic key management, should be defined and implemented.
Requirements.Name: Use of Cryptography

Attributes.Check_Summary: Verify that encryption is enabled for data at rest and in transit.
